description:
Reusable heat at the snap of your fingers (well, the metal disc). These hand warmers provide a quick burst of heat, and can be recharged up to 100 times.

  • Maximum temperature ranges from 50 to 57°C
  • Generates heat for up to 30 minutes
  • Activates by snapping the stainless steel disc
  • To reuse, simply place pack in boiling water for approximately 5 minutes
  • Includes 2 hand warmers
name: Hot Poc Reusable Hand Warmers
